name: Massi (itch)
description:
Your objective is to get Massimo to the green exit.

Use your arrow keys to move him around.

Trial, error and exploration will get you through.

If you get stuck, press X to restart the level. Press Z to undo 1 move (up to 10 undos). Your level progress will be saved in your browser. Your grid progress will not be saved.

Good Luck.
